text: Arizona is a 1931 American romantic drama movie directed by George B. Seitz and is the third version of the 1899 play of the same name by Augustus Thomas. It stars John Wayne, Laura Le Plante, June Clyde, Forrest Stanley, Nina Quartero, Susan Fleming and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 romance movies Category:1931 drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George B. Seitz Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Arizona
title: Arizona (movie)
